description: A property of a workflow specification node shall be defined as a workflow specification node property.
title: Workflow specification node property
$comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.04-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 4: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

links.dtdl:description: The child workflow specification node properties of this workflow specification node property.
If the workflow specification node supports a workflow specification node type, the workflow specification node type property is applied in this workflow specification node property(s).

value.title: Value
value.description: The value, set of values, or range of the property.

valueUnitOfMeasure.title: Value unit of measure
valueUnitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measure of the associated property value
